sourcesContent:
import {Grid, GridItem, Tabs} from "@chakra-ui/react"
import Sidebar from "./Sidebar"
import Chat from "./Chat"

const Home = () => {
  return (
    <Grid templateColumns="repeat(10, 1fr)" h="100vh" as={Tabs}>
        <GridItem colSpan="3" borderRight="1px solid gray">
            <Sidebar/>
        </GridItem>
        <GridItem colSpan="7">
            <Chat/>
        </GridItem>
    </Grid>
  )
}

export default Home
